sentences: Wojciech Łukaszewski, born 10 March 1936 in Częstochowa – 13 April 1978 in Częstochowa, was a Polish composer, pedagogue, music writer and musical impresario.
In 1963, he married Maria Patrzyk, and they had two sons, the composer Paweł Łukaszewski and the musician and author Marcin Łukaszewski.
